description.value:
Melee Attacks against Orks gain Felling(2) Medals can't be acquired, only earned. Looks Like a Silver Star with Gold Inlay, held in a Green Ribbon.

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Kill an Ork Warboss.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
